Class MapColorPalette

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.map.MapColorPalette

  • public class MapColorPalette
extends java.lang.Object
    Additional functionality on top of Bukkit's MapPalette

      • getColorCount

        public static int getColorCount()
        Gets the total number of map colors that exist on the server. The returned value is the exclusive maximum index for getRealColor(int).
        Returns:
        maximum color count

      • isTransparent

        public static boolean isTransparent(byte color)
        Gets whether a particular color code is a transparent color. There are 4 transparent colors available. Usually value 0 is used.
        Parameters:
        color - value
        Returns:
        True if transparent

      • getColor

        public static byte getColor(java.awt.Color color)
        Gets the Minecraft map color code for an RGB color
        Parameters:
        color - input
        Returns:
        minecraft color

        Gets the Minecraft map color code for an RGB color
        Parameters:
        r - - red component
        g - - green component
        b - - blue component
        Returns:

      • getSpecular

        public static byte getSpecular(byte color,
                               float lightness)
        Makes a color darker or brighter based on a specular float value.
        Parameters:
        color - to transform
        lightness - factor. 0 is darkest (black), 1 is normal, 2 is brightest (white).
        Returns:
        specular color
